resources.string: This app requires access to your location in Background to function properly. Please manually enable the location permission in the app settings by choosing Allow All The Time.

To enable the Auto-launch feature for the Hicare app, please follow these steps:
 1. Go to device Settings.
 2. Search for Auto-launch apps and select it.
 3. In the list of apps, search for the Hicare app.
 4. Enable the "Auto-launch" toggle for Hicare.

In order to accurately record your activities throughout the day, We want to let you know that we are accessing your location and activity. Don\'t worry, your data will be securely stored and used solely within the our app.

Autostart permission is required to launch and run the services of HiCare in the background without requiring manual intervention, Please Allow it for HiCare.
